entry.content: ... that one of the bosses of the video game CarnEvil can be replaced with a giant teddy bear?

entry.title: Eva Coo
entry.content: ... that police forced Eva Coo and her accomplice to reenact a killing at the crime scene using the victim's exhumed body?

entry.title: Villains Are Destined to Die
entry.content: ... that the art of Villains Are Destined to Die was said to be "almost in-between the Disney happy-ending fairy tales and the original Grimm's stories"?

entry.content: ... that Ingersoll's Ordinary was used as a prison during the Salem witch trials?

entry.title: Tish Weinstock
entry.content: ... that Tish Weinstock got married over the Halloween weekend in 2022 at a castle wearing a wedding dress made from antique lace styled after Morticia Addams?

entry.title: Featured Travel Topic

Featured Travel Topic

Driving in China

China isn't one of the countries that foreigners commonly explore by driving themselves. If you'd still like to, the first step would be getting a local driving licence.

entry.title: Off the Beaten Path
entry.content:
Off the Beaten Path

Sekigahara

This quaint mountain town and battlefield, where Tokugawa won control of Japan, gives visitors firsthand insight into feudal Japanese warfare.

entry.title: Destination of the Month
entry.content:
Destination of the Month

Parahyangan

The West Javanese region centred around Java's third largest city of Bandung is an excellent place to hike and admire active volcanoes.
